Package RRPSS

Class StaffDB

Object
StaffDB
public class StaffDB extends Object
Staff database used to retrieve, update, store and remove staff in the company. Stores information of the staff into StaffDB.txt file in the database folder. Prints the sale records according to the specified date.
Since:
2021-11-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Chua Chong Yih

    StaffDB()

  • Field Details

      private ArrayList<Staff> staffList
      List of all staff in the company.

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffDB

      public StaffDB() throws IOException
      Creates a new Staff database and creates a new StaffDB.txt file in the database folder to store the information of all staff in the company. Updates the Staff list with the information in the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

  • Method Details

    • getFromStaffFile

      public void getFromStaffFile() throws IOException
      Reads the StaffDB.txt file and updates this database with the information in the text file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • updateToStaffFile

      public void updateToStaffFile() throws IOException
      Writes the list of Staff in this database into the StaffDB.txt file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • searchStaff

      public Staff searchStaff​(int staffID)
      Searches this database for an entry with the corresponding staff ID.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the staff ID of the staff to be searched for.
      Returns:
      the instance of the matching staff.

    • addStaff

      public void addStaff​(String name, Gender gender, int employeeID, String jobTitle) throws IOException
      Creates a new staff using the parameters and adds the new staff into this database.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the staff to be added.
      gender - the gender of the staff to be added.
      employeeID - the employee ID of the staff to be added.
      jobTitle - the job title of the staff to be added.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • removeStaff

      public void removeStaff​(int staffID) throws IOException
      Removes a staff from the database using the parameter given. Displays an error message if staff is not found.
      Parameters:
      staffID - the staff ID of the staff to be removed.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • updateStaff

      public void updateStaff​(int employeeID, Scanner sc) throws IOException
      Updates the staff in the database with the employeeID given. Prompts user for name, staff ID, job title to update the entry.
      Parameters:
      employeeID - the employee ID of the staff to be updated.
      sc - the scanner instance for input operations.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurred.

    • printStaffList

      public void printStaffList()
      Prints the list of staff in the database.
